title: O/L aesthetic practical exams postponed to Monday: Exams Dept
body_lines: Practical examinations for music and dancing subjects of the 2021 (2022) GCE Ordinary Level (O/L) examination will not be held tomorrow (3) due to the imposition of curfew in the country, the Examinations Department said.
The Department's Commissioner, L.M.D. Dharmasena said the decision to postpone the examination was conveyed to the members of the examination centre boards.
Accordingly, the practical exams for local and international dancing, aesthetic and Western music and Karnatic music subjects will be postponed till Monday.
Hence, the department requested that the candidates who wish to sit for the practical exams tomorrow, will have to appear for same on Monday. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
